value:
$WmMPID_クレア,ch10_03_Crea_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Why, it's laughable! Me, serve you?
You're just a little girl.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Now, now, Clair... I possess you by
contract. Just try to defy me.$k$pI have you wrapped around my
little finger. Now, get to it.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_02,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I suppose it was inevitable that we'd
lose without Alm. Still, how awful.$k$pCome along, Lukas. We're leaving.$k$p$WmMPID_ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Normal,Face|$w0|This contract does...seem to be
binding. Hmm. I guess we have
no choice but to follow.$k$p$Sbs150|
